abilities.name: Magnetic Blast
abilities.description: Shoot a projectile in a straight line. All entities that come in contact with its effect area will be attached to it. Explodes after hitting a wall with its center, damaging all attached entities.

abilities.name: 360 No-Scope
abilities.description: Shoot a projectile.

abilities.name: Star Storm
abilities.description: Deal damage to all players, including yourself (does not trigger escape).

abilities.name: Draconic Wings
abilities.description: Fly to the target and slash it. Use a basic attack after 3 seconds. Ignore all damage while preforming this ability.

abilities.name: Pyromaster
abilities.description: Summon 3 mines. Use a basic attack/ability after cast.

abilities.name: Arise
abilities.description: Sacrifice 1 HP and bring back 1 player from the dead with 1 HP.

abilities.name: Aura Pulse
abilities.description: Damage all entities around you. If you have damaged at least 2 entities, recover 1 HP and 2 mana.

abilities.name: Snipe
abilities.description: Shoot a projectile at your target. This damage can not be blocked.

abilities.name: Minedrop
abilities.description: Summon 1 mine. Use a basic attack/ability after cast.

abilities.name: Blaze Wheel
abilities.description: Drag your marble back from your intended attack direction (Range: 2) and then attack.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Fly to the target and drop your marble on it.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Move all entities away from your marble, but no further than Range 3 from the epicenter (can be used before escaping).

abilities.name: Entomb
abilities.description: Entomb the target in a static barrier. Moving horizontally into the barrier causes it to explode, dealing 1 damage to whoever touched it (applies to entombed target too).

abilities.name: Bouncing Doom
abilities.description: Shoot a projectile. If it hits an entity, it damages it and jumps to another target if in range (can’t hit same targets twice).

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description: Restore 1 HP to any entity. Escape after cast.

abilities.name: Shroom
abilities.description: Summon an indestructible node. Players that hit the node will be stopped in place, allowing them to reset the range of their current attack. Use a basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Explosive Shot
abilities.description: An attack that deals splash damage every time it hits a wall or an entity. Deals no contact damage.

abilities.name: Meteor Strike
abilities.description: Lift your marble in the air at your position and toss it at your target, creating an explosion at the first ground contact. Impact damage is doubled.
abilities.upgradeText: Ignore all damage while using this ability

abilities.name: Bomb Toss
abilities.description: Create an explosion at chosen location. Escape after cast.

abilities.name: Thunder Blast
abilities.description: Fly to the target and drop your marble on it.

abilities.name: Leeching Strike
abilities.description: Attack any entity. If you damage it, recover 1 hp to yourself.

abilities.name: Blind Shot
abilities.description: Attack an enemy with your eyes closed. Escape after cast.

abilities.name: Barrier
abilities.description: Summon a barrier and use a basic attack. Consecutive uses will move the barrier (if in range) and give you an extra turn.

abilities.name: Mine Launcher
abilities.description: Pull up to 2 mines to your position and attack with them. If there are less than 2 mines nearby, you can summon mines for the attack at your position until you have 2 mines. Spend 1 mana for each mine summoned. Escape after cast.

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description: Attack an enemy. Can only deal damage to targets within range.

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.description: Spin your marble at the target. This attack will damage entities until your marble stops.

abilities.name: Possession
abilities.description: Attack with another entity. This attack has the damage and effect of the entity.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Switch places with another player. Use a basic attack or ability after cast.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: You are immune to all damage this turn, but your attacks can’t damage players. Attack a non-player entity (can verge). If you hit, repeat this action (until you miss). Recover 1 mana for each destroyed enty.

abilities.name: Convert
abilities.description: Sacrifice 1 HP and restore 3 mana to yourself. Escape after cast.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport forward. Use a basic attack/ability after cast.

abilities.name: Wing Attack
abilities.description: Fly to the target and slash.

abilities.name: Clone Strike
abilities.description: Attack a target. If you hit, let the target escape, return to your previous position and repeat the process (until you miss). These attacks can verge.

abilities.name: Multistrike
abilities.description: Attack a target. If you hit, repeat the attack on another target from hit position (can’t be used on targets that already got damaged this turn). These attacks can verge.

abilities.name: Death Ray
abilities.description: Shoot a penetrating projectile (can damage multiple entities but can’t penetrate walls).

abilities.name: Sky Blast
abilities.description: On first turn, your marble flies up into the sky where it can’t be hit by attacks. On next turn, drop on the target dealing spash damage. If you miss, the the splash damage cancels and you take 1 damage instead. Can be used instead of escape. Uses 2 turns in total.

abilities.name: Star Beam
abilities.description: Shoot a non-damaging projectile that resets its range after hitting an entity, spreading further. When the projectile draws a closed loop, it detonates, damaging all players inside of the drawn polygons.

abilities.name: Ricoshette
abilities.description: A hopping projectile that resets its range after hitting any wall/barrier. Can hit multiple walls/barriers but can’t penetrate them.

abilities.name: Scorch
abilities.description: Slash a target and empty all their mana.

abilities.name: Quickshot
abilities.description: Use a basic attack and return to your starting position after your marble stops (can verge). You are immune to damage while using this ability.

abilities.name: Nether Rift
abilities.description: Destroy all non-player entities.
abilities.upgradeText: Costs 1 less and takes 1 slot less

abilities.name: Tectonic Wall
abilities.description: Create a barrier from one wall to another and summon 2 nodes on each side of the barrier. The barrier destroys only when both nodes get knocked out. Must be used close to a wall.

abilities.name: Quadraphase
abilities.description: Mult-step attack. 1: Attack a target without triggering escape (can verge). 2: Launch a R2 projectile after 3 seconds. 3: Teleport the first hit target to your starting location. 4: Teleport to a R2 location.

abilities.name: Mana Transfer
abilities.description: Transfer up to your entire mana pool to another player. Escape after cast.

abilities.name: Geomancer
abilities.description: Summon 4 mines around your marble. Next turn, if you haven't taken any damage from the previous turn, attack with all 4 mines and escape with your marble.

abilities.name: Hurricane
abilities.description: Spin your marble and collect all entities around it. After 10 seconds, drop all collected entities around your marble, damaging them. Damaged players empty all their mana.

abilities.name: Heartbreaker
abilities.description: Attack a player 3 times without changing your position, with 3 seconds cooldown after each attack (these attacks don't deal any damage, does not trigger escape, can verge once). If you hit 3 times, damage the target, empty 1 of their mana, and recover 1 HP.

abilities.name: Time Leap
abilities.description: Summon a point at your current position. Consecutive uses will teleport you to the point. Use a basic attac/ability after cast.

abilities.name: Master Strike
abilities.description: An attack that deals 1 additional damage for each time your marble bounces off a wall or a non player entity. Can verge.

abilities.name: Flamethrower
abilities.description: Damage everything in a 90º angle originated from your marble (the area extends in a cone shape). Damaged players empty 1 mana.

abilities.name: Banana Time
abilities.description: Summon 2 healing mines (min distance between mines: 1). When a player destroys this mine, they regenerate 1 HP. Escape after cast (can’t heal from these mines during this escape).

abilities.name: Toxin Cloud
abilities.description: Create an explosion (deals no damage). All players in affected area will take 1 more damage from the next damage source. Effect can’t stack.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: Lift your marble in the air at your position and toss it at your target. Can only damage players that are in range.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Shoot a wide penetrating projectile that bashes away all entities that it hits. Affected entities gain +1 contact damage until the end of your turn (they only take damage after they stop).

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Attack the target. The target will take 1 extra damage your next turn. The second damage will not trigger escape and on-death effects. You take x2 damage from anything while performing this ability.

abilities.name: Berserk Strike
abilities.description: Attack an enemy. If you miss, take 1 damage.

abilities.name: Polar Shift
abilities.description: All entities are moved to the closest wall or barrier.

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.description: Summon a point and give yourself an extra turn. When a second point is summoned, they get linked. Hitting one of them will teleport you to the other one, from which you can reset your attack range. Only players with this card can use the portals. You can only have one portal pair.

abilities.name: Death's Touch
abilities.description: Attack a player. If you damage them, activate all their on-death effects. If you miss, take 1 damage.

abilities.name: Fairy Sawblade
abilities.description: Attack a player. If you damage them, activate all their on-death effects. If you miss, take 1 damage.

abilities.name: Dark Wind
abilities.description: Blind all other players and double the damage that they receive until your next turn. Escape after use.

abilities.name: Rearrange
abilities.description: Move all non-player entities. Escape after use.

abilities.name: Aura Discharge
abilities.description: Charge up for 1 turn. On your next turn, damage all players around your marble. You can’t take damage while charging this ability. Escape after finishing this ability.

abilities.name: Enrich
abilities.description: Enrich ALL non-player entities in an area (mines, barriers, etc.), giving them +1 contact damage. Use a basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Bounce Wall
abilities.description: Summon a special barrier and escape. When hit by a projectile, the barrier resets the projectile's range, allowing the caster to shoot it again from impact point (can not penetrate the barrier). Consecutive uses will move the barrier (if in range) and give you an extra turn.

abilities.name: Warp Mine
abilities.description: Summon a special mine and give yourself an extra turn. Consecutive uses will switch your position with the mine, after which you can use a basic attack/ability (until it is destroyed).

passives.name: Berserker
passives.description: Your abilities cost 0 mana, but after using an ability gain -1 max mana. When you reach 0 max mana, discard this card.

passives.name: Blademaster
passives.description: After landing 4 basic attacks on players, gain a shield that will block first external damage that you take (does not charge while you have the shield).

passives.name: Glory
passives.description: Gain +2 max mana when a player dies.

items.name: Lasso
items.description: Drag the target towards your marble.

items.name: Adrenaline
items.description: If your basic attack hits this turn (on any entity), repeat it on a different target ONE more time from hit position. Can verge on entities.

items.name: Growth Script
items.description: Dispense all your mana in form of mines.

upgrades.name: Tinkerer
upgrades.description: Your upgrade cards can upgrade twice as many cards, but reduces your max item slots by 3
